songs.title: Waterbed
songs.lyrics:

Like a song stuck in my head, I wanna make love on this waterbed
You give me every reason to, to think about holding you
Touching you, loving you, baby, yeah, yeah

You got something special, I don’t wanna let go
Cannonball into my bed, we're loving on a waterbed
Hope you don’t get seasick, girl, aquafina under your body
I'll stroke it, stroke it, are you wet?
Can we make love on a waterbed? On a waterbed-bed-bed
On a waterbed-bed-bed, woah
Can we make love on a waterbed? On a waterbed-bed-bed
On a waterbed-bed-bed, on a waterbed, oh, woah

And don’t it feel good right now?
Baby girl, I'm looking deep in your eyes, your legs trembling
I'm swimming in your body
I'm your number one fan, girl
I want you more than anything
